name: GraceTabernacleApostolicChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Grace Tabernacle”
”Alexa, ask Grace Tabernacle to play the devotion”
”Alexa, ask Grace Tabernacle to play the sermon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grace tabernacle
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the Grace Tabernacle Alexa app.

You can now listen to the latest sermons, and Into a New Day Tamil daily devotions, anytime, on your Alexa enabled devices.

Once you’ve enabled the Grace Tabernacle app, you can launch it by saying: “Alexa, open Grace Tabernacle”

Then, try asking Grace Tabernacle:
"play today's devotion"
"play the latest sermon"
"tell you the church's address"
"play the devotion from April 19"
"play the sermons from March 2018"
"tell you the church website address"

To find out more about Grace Tabernacle Apostolic Church, visit our website at https://gtachurch.ca
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
